text: I’m thrilled to share that I’ve joined Microsoft as a Software Engineer! After months of preparation, interviews, and learning, I’m excited to begin this new chapter. Thank you to everyone who supported me — mentors, peers, and friends. To those still on their path: keep going. It’s worth it! #NewBeginnings #Microsoft #Gratitude #SoftwareEngineering @Microsoft
author: Ananya Sharma

text: Excited to start my summer internship at Razorpay! I'm grateful for the opportunity to join the Product team at Razorpay as a Product Intern. Looking forward to learning, building, and growing over the next 8 weeks. If you're interested in the fintech space, I’d love to connect! #Internship #Fintech #Razorpay #ProductManagement @Razorpay
author: Ravi Kumar

text: Soft skills are the hardest to learn. As a tech leader, I’ve come to realize that technical knowledge is just the starting point. Communication, empathy, and adaptability often define who excels in the long run. Let’s stop calling them ‘soft’ skills — they’re essential. #Leadership #TechCulture #CareerGrowth
author: Priya Desai

text: We launched our AI-powered resume review tool — ResumAI! After months of late nights, feedback loops, and iterations, we’re live. ResumAI helps job seekers tailor their resumes using AI. Would love for you to try it out and share your thoughts. Big shoutout to my co-founders and team! #Startup #ProductLaunch #AI #JobSearch @ResumAI
author: Nikhil Verma

text: We failed to close our first funding round. It stings. We pitched to 14 investors, heard 14 different versions of 'No'. But every conversation gave us clarity. We’re now reworking our deck, rebuilding our product vision, and pushing forward. Failure isn’t the end — it’s feedback. #Startuplife #Resilience #FailureToSuccess
author: Mehul Patel

text: Shoutout to the amazing community at Google Developer Group Delhi! Attending GDG Delhi this weekend reminded me how powerful peer learning is. The sessions, people, and energy were incredible. If you're into tech, design, or just learning, I highly recommend these events. #Community #GoogleDevelopers #GDGDelhi #Networking @GoogleDeveloperGroup
author: Ayesha Iqbal

text: We’re hiring at Zenspace! 🚀 Our design team is looking for a passionate UI/UX designer to join us full-time. If you’re excited about building tools for the remote future, reach out or apply at zenspace.io/careers. #Hiring #DesignJobs #RemoteWork @Zenspace
author: Swati Reddy
